GSD.product_version: versions from v5.7 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
HID: mcp2221: prevent a buffer overflow in mcp_smbus_write()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 66c8e816f2f2ca4a61b406503bd10bad1b35f72f, it was introduced in version v5.7 by commit 67a95c21463d066060b0f66d65a75d45bb386ffb. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: HID: mcp2221: prevent a buffer overflow in mcp_smbus_write()
